com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat

Class TimedGlobalChatManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat.TimedGlobalChatManager

  • public class TimedGlobalChatManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 1/25/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: PerWorldChatPlus The manager class for Timed Global Chat. This class contains the functions for everything Timed Global chat related.
